channel.title: PkedIsle ...(Not much)
channel.description:
This is what I've did so far from my rs2e source, it won't be much to ya'll but it means the world to me since I know I didn't leech this and it's actauly mine.
I've been working on it and so far I have some of these things.
- In the original rs2e you could mass "::addxp # ######" And get over 10k in a stat like so 10000/99, I made a ::master command that only works once, creds to Hidendra for helping ~.^.
- I removed ::bank and replaced it with bankers around.
- Working on making a full varrock, shops etc, I have the npcs placed :).
- I also made a command for making people admin\mod, and a kick command. Before only one person could be mod\admin, the char files are in .dat and serialized to where you can't read them.
- Working on full edge, I have a mage that takes you there from Varrock pk spot, but it's not 1 vs 1 yet..;(
- Added new shops and working on kbd respawn in wildy in aggressive mode :).
Yes, I know it's not much but this isn't a normal wL lame server unstable lags at 20 people, I can't find any tuts for working on this, so gimmie a break.
Hidendra was like the best help most creds to my edits to him, he helps alot but I get on his nerves :P.
Here's a pic of some of my testers, I didn't post server on ss yet but i have like 11 people who always play. I'm working hard and I know atm it is fail. [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/ezh3wm.jpg[/img] Sorry bout the advertising...

item.title: PkedIsle ...(Not much)
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

This is what I’ve did so far from my rs2e source, it won’t be much to ya’ll but it means the world to me since I know I didn’t leech this and it’s actauly mine.

I’ve been working on it and so far I have some of these things.

  • In the original rs2e you could mass “::addxp # ######” And get over 10k in a stat like so 10000/99, I made a ::master command that only works once, creds to Hidendra for helping ~.^.

  • I removed ::bank and replaced it with bankers around.

  • Working on making a full varrock, shops etc, I have the npcs placed :).

  • I also made a command for making people admin\mod, and a kick command. Before only one person could be mod\admin, the char files are in .dat and serialized to where you can’t read them.

  • Working on full edge, I have a mage that takes you there from Varrock pk spot, but it’s not 1 vs 1 yet…;(

  • Added new shops and working on kbd respawn in wildy in aggressive mode :).

Yes, I know it’s not much but this isn’t a normal wL lame server unstable lags at 20 people, I can’t find any tuts for working on this, so gimmie a break.

Hidendra was like the best help most creds to my edits to him, he helps alot but I get on his nerves :P.

Here’s a pic of some of my testers, I didn’t post server on ss yet but i have like 11 people who always play. I’m working hard and I know atm it is fail.

Sorry bout the advertising…
